content.raw: This is great, thanks! Will the received signal strength be coming from the path loss model you're implementing? If not, what will you be leveraging to generate that measurement? How are the packets passed up to the comms client \(Nate’s step 2\)? Is it through a dedicated port? Or is that all internal to the comms client and accessible by function calls or similar?
content.html: This is great, thanks! Will the received signal strength be coming from the path loss model you're implementing? If not, what will you be leveraging to generate that measurement? How are the packets passed up to the comms client (Nate’s step 2)? Is it through a dedicated port? Or is that all internal to the comms client and accessible by function calls or similar?
